LanguageData.Disarm.label: disarm
LanguageData.Disarm.description: Psychically-induced mental weakness, loosening grip completely.

LanguageData.Dread.description: Psychically-induced fear, causing a nervous breakdown.
LanguageData.EntropyBond.label: entropy bond
LanguageData.EntropyBond.description: A psychic link with another individual. Gain or loss of psychic entropy incurred by one will be shared between both.
